## Translation Contribution

**Language:** <!-- e.g., French (fr) -->

**Type:**
- [ ] New translation
- [ ] Update/correction to existing translation

**How was this translation created?**
- [ ] Manual translation by native/fluent speaker
- [ ] AI-assisted with human review
- [ ] Other: <!-- please describe -->

**Reviewer qualifications:**
- [ ] I am a native speaker of this language
- [ ] I am fluent in this language
- [ ] I had a native speaker review this

## Checklist

- [ ] Frontmatter is complete (`language`, `languageName`, `title`, `subtitle`, `lastUpdated`)
- [ ] All sections are translated
- [ ] Organization names (ACLU, etc.) kept in English
- [ ] Phone numbers unchanged
- [ ] Markdown formatting preserved
- [ ] No obvious machine translation artifacts
